Invasion of Germany (Western Allies).Location: Western Germany, Southern Germany, Czechoslovakia, Austria
Invasion of Germany (Western Allies).Result: Allied victory | Fall of Nazi Germany | End of World War II in Europe (concurrently with the Eastern Front)
Invasion of Germany (Western Allies): Part of the Western Front of the European theatre of World War II
Wernberg1945.jpg | American infantrymen of the U.S. 11th Armored Division supported by an M4 Sherman tank move through a smoke filled street in Wernberg, Germany, April 1945.
